tika-abh08t24:1_3: hi atthato paṇāmakiriyābhinipphādikā kusalacetanā. Sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṁ khettajjhāsayasampadāhi
tika-abh08t24:1_7: rāgādimalavikkhālanena ca cittasantānaṁ parisodhetvā tannissitāya paññāya yathādhippetasiddhisampādakaṁ
tika-abh08t24:1_8: tikkhavisadabhāvamāvahati. Kiñci āciṇṇametaṁ paṇḍitānaṁ, yadidaṁ ganthasamārambhe
tika-abh08t24:1_10: āraddhāti evamādinā aññānipi bahūni payojanāni niddhāretabbāni. Tāni pana tattha
tika-abh08t24:1_11: tattha bahudhā vitthāritānīti taṁ papañcaparissamaṁ ṭhapetvā yathānuppattameva tāva vaṇṇayissāma.
tika-abh08t24:2_0: Ettha ca ratanattayappaṇāmaṁ kattukāmo tathāgatamūlakattā sesaratanānaṁ paṭhamaṁ
tika-abh08t24:2_2: Thomanāpubbaṅgamena hi paṇāmena satthu guṇātisayayogo, tato cassa anuttaravandanīyabhāvo,
tika-abh08t24:2_3: tena ca attano vandanāya khettaṅgatabhāvo, khettaṅgatāya ca vandanāya yathādhippetanipphattiyā
tika-abh08t24:3_0: Tattha vanditvāti pubbakālakiriyāniddeso. Tassa pana osānagāthāyaṁ ‘‘pavakkhāmī’’ti
tika-abh08t24:3_1: iminā aparakālakiriyāvacanena saha sambandho. Buddhanti vandanakiriyāya kammaniddeso.
tika-abh08t24:3_2: ‘‘Anantakaruṇāpañña’’ntiādikaṁ pana tabbisesanaṁ. Tattha kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṁ
tika-abh08t24:3_3: vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Kirīyati dukkhitesu pasārīyatīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā karotīti
tika-abh08t24:3_4: karuṇā, paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṁ kampanaṁ hadayakhedaṁ janayatīti attho. Kiṇātīti
tika-abh08t24:3_5: vā karuṇā, parassa dukkhaṁ paccayavekallakaraṇato hiṁsatīti attho. Pajānātīti paññā,
tika-abh08t24:3_6: yathāsabhāvaṁ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Karuṇā ca paññā ca karuṇāpaññā, natthi
tika-abh08t24:3_7: etāsaṁ antoti anantā, anantā karuṇāpaññā etassāti anantakaruṇāpañño, taṁ anantakaruṇāpaññaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:4_0: Ettha ca uppādavayantatāvasena ceva santatipariyosānavasena ca satipi bhagavato karuṇāpaññānaṁ
tika-abh08t24:4_1: sapariyantabhāve anantārammaṇesu pavattanato anantatā veditabbā. Sammāsambuddhassa
tika-abh08t24:4_2: hi sabbasattānaṁ dukkhāpanayanākārappavattā anaññasādhāraṇā mahākaruṇā kañci sattaṁ
tika-abh08t24:4_3: avajjetvā sabbesu sattesu niravasesena pavattati, tathā sabbadhammasabhāvabodhanasamatthā
tika-abh08t24:4_4: sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātā paññāpi sakalañeyyadhammesu anavasesato pavattati, tasmā
tika-abh08t24:4_6: cettha bhagavato sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇasampatti dassitā hoti. Tathā hi karuṇāggahaṇena
tika-abh08t24:5_0: Apica sabbabuddhaguṇānaṁ karuṇā ādi, paññā pariyosānaṁ. Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso
tika-abh08t24:5_1: hi bhagavā saṁsārapaṅkato sattānaṁ samuddharaṇatthāya katābhinīhāro anupubbena pāramiyo
tika-abh08t24:5_2: pūretvā anuttarasammāsambodhiyā adhigamena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭilabhi. Iti sakalabuddhaguṇānaṁ
tika-abh08t24:5_4: maggañāṇassa paṭilabhanato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato paññā pariyosānaṁ. Ādipariyosānadassanena
tika-abh08t24:5_5: ca sakalabuddhaguṇā nayato dassitā honti. Nayaggāho eva hi sabbabuddhaguṇānaṁ dassanupāyo,
tika-abh08t24:5_6: itarathā tādisassa sabbaññubuddhassapi vacanapathātītaṁ tathāgataguṇaṁ anupadaṁ vaṇṇento
tika-abh08t24:6_0: Evaṁ karuṇāpaññāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalabuddhaguṇehi bhagavantaṁ thometvāpi puna
tika-abh08t24:6_1: attano buddhaguṇasaṁkittane atittābhāvena ceva paresañca pasādabāhullajananatthaṁ
tika-abh08t24:6_2: tadantogadhepi visiṭṭhaguṇe padhānabhāvena nīharitvā dassento āha ‘‘tathāgata’’ntiādi.
tika-abh08t24:6_3: Tattha ‘‘tathāgata’’nti tathā āgatatādīhi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgataṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ
tika-abh08t24:6_4: (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.7; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.12; bu. vaṁ. aṭṭha. 1.2 nidānakathā; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.170) –
tika-abh08t24:7_0: ‘‘Aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato, tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato,
tika-abh08t24:7_1: tathalakkhaṇaṁ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato,
tika-abh08t24:7_2: tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato, abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato’’ti.
tika-abh08t24:8_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ bhagavā tathā āgatoti tathāgato? Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā
tika-abh08t24:8_1: sammāsambuddhā āgatā, kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti? Manussattādiaṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena yena abhinīhārena
tika-abh08t24:8_2: te bhagavanto āgatā, teneva ca abhinīhārena ayampi bhagavā āgato, yathā ca te bhagavanto
tika-abh08t24:8_3: samatiṁsa pāramiyo pūretvā pañcamahāpariccāgādīni sampādetvā āgatā, yathā ca te sattatiṁsa
tika-abh08t24:8_4: bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgatā, tathā ayampi bhagavā āgatoti evaṁ tāva
tika-abh08t24:9_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijātā te bhagavanto sattapadavītihārena
tika-abh08t24:9_1: gatā, yathā vā te samathavipassanāmaggehi taṁ taṁ akusalapakkhaṁ vidhamitvā gatā,
tika-abh08t24:9_2: tathā ayampi bhagavā gato, evaṁ tathā gatoti tathāgato. (2)
tika-abh08t24:10_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ tathalakkhaṇaṁ āgatoti tathāgato? Yasmā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ yaṁ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṁ
tika-abh08t24:10_1: tathaṁ avitathaṁ, tañcesa tathalakkhaṇaṁ āgato yāthāvato adhigato, tasmā tathalakkhaṇaṁ
tika-abh08t24:10_2: āgatoti tathāgato gamanatthānaṁ bujjhanatthasambhavato. Tathā hi vadanti ‘ye gatiatthā,
tika-abh08t24:10_3: te bujjhanatthā. Ye bujjhanatthā, te gatiatthā’ti. (3)
tika-abh08t24:11_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato? Yasmā ‘idaṁ dukkhanti,
tika-abh08t24:11_2: paccayaṭṭho saṅkhārānaṁ avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho’tiādivacanato
tika-abh08t24:11_3: ca tathadhammasaṅkhāte saccapaṭiccasamuppāde yāthāvato āgato abhisambuddho, tasmā
tika-abh08t24:12_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ tathadassitāya tathāgato? Yasmā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṁ sattānaṁ
tika-abh08t24:12_1: chadvāraggahite ārammaṇe aviparītameva passati jānāti, ñatvā ca panevaṁ ‘katamaṁ
tika-abh08t24:12_2: taṁ rūpāyatanaṁ, yaṁ catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ upādāyā’tiādinā (dha. sa. 616 ādayo) tathamesa
tika-abh08t24:12_3: aviparītaṁ vibhajati dasseti, tasmā tathaṁ āgacchati passati jānāti, taṁ vā āgamayati
tika-abh08t24:13_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ tathavāditāya tathāgato? Yasmā esa abhisambodhito yāva parinibbānā rāgamadādinimmathanavasena
tika-abh08t24:13_1: ekasadisameva dhammaṁ tathaṁ avitathaṁ bhāsati, tasmā tathaṁ gadati, tatho aviparīto
tika-abh08t24:13_2: āgadovacanametassāti vā da-kārassa ta-kāraṁ katvā tathāgatoti vuttoti evaṁ tathavāditāya tathāgato. (6)
tika-abh08t24:14_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ tathākāritāya tathāgato? Bhagavā hi ‘yathā vādī tathā kārī’ti (a. ni. 4.23;
tika-abh08t24:14_1: cūḷani. posālamāṇavapucchāniddesa 83) vacanato attano vācāya anurūpameva karoti,
tika-abh08t24:14_2: tasmā yathā vācā, tathā kāyopi gato pavatto imassāti tathāgatoti evaṁ tathākāritāya tathāgato. (7)
tika-abh08t24:15_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato? Yasmā panesa anupamāya sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇasampadāya
tika-abh08t24:15_1: samannāgatattā sadevakaṁ lokaṁ abhibhuyya pavattati, tasmā abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgatoti vuccatī’’ti.
tika-abh08t24:16_0: Tatrevaṁ padasiddhi veditabbā – agado viyāti agado, desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
tika-abh08t24:16_1: ca. Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe sabbaparappavādino, sadevakañca
tika-abh08t24:16_2: lokaṁ abhibhavati. Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto yathāvutto agado etassāti
tika-abh08t24:16_3: da-kārassa ta-kāraṁ katvā tathāgatoti vuccatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana
tika-abh08t24:20: Tathāgato vuccati tena cakkhumā. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.7; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.12; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.170; bu. vaṁ. aṭṭha. 1.2 nidānakathā);
tika-abh08t24:40: Tathāgato tenapi lokanāyako’’ti. (itivu. aṭṭha. 38; dī. ni. ṭī. 1.7);
tika-abh08t24:41_0: Kenaci guṇena attano visiṭṭhassa kassaci abhāvato natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.
tika-abh08t24:41_1: Bhagavato hi avīcito paṭṭhāya yāva bhavaggaṁ tiriyaṁ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu na koci
tika-abh08t24:41_2: kenaci guṇena samasamopi atthi, kuto pana uttaritaro. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t24:44_0: Vinditvāti tīhi vandanāhi tanninnatādivasena namassitvā. Kāyavacīmanodvāravasena
tika-abh08t24:44_1: hi tisso vandanā. Yathāha ‘‘tisso imā, bhikkhave, vandanā kāyena vandati, vacasā
tika-abh08t24:44_2: vandati, manasā vandatī’’ti. Tattha buddhādiguṇārammaṇā kāmāvacarakusalakiriyānamaññatarā
tika-abh08t24:44_3: cetanā kāyaviññattiṁ samuṭṭhāpetvā kāyadvārappavattivasena uppannā kāyavandanāti
tika-abh08t24:44_4: vuccati, sāyeva vacīviññattiṁ samuṭṭhāpetvā vacīdvārappavattivasena uppannā vacīvandanāti,
tika-abh08t24:44_5: ubhayaviññattiyo pana asamuṭṭhāpetvā kevalaṁ manodvārappavattivasena uppannā manovandanāti.
tika-abh08t24:44_6: Sirasāti uttamaṅgena karaṇabhūtena. Abujjhi, bodhetīti vā buddho. Ayañhi catusaccadhamme
tika-abh08t24:44_7: sayampi abujjhi, parepi bodheti , tasmā bujjhanabodhanaṭṭhena ‘‘buddho’’ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t24:44_8: Yathāha ‘‘bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho’’ti (mahāni. 192; cūḷani.
tika-abh08t24:44_9: pārāyanatthutigāthāniddesa 97; paṭi. ma. 1.162). Atha vā budha-saddassa jāgaraṇavikasanatthesupi
tika-abh08t24:44_10: pavattanato abujjhi savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṁ vigato, buddhiyā vikasitavāti
tika-abh08t24:44_11: vā buddho. Bhagavā hi vatthusabhāvadassanavibandhikāya avijjāsaṅkhātāya niddāya ariyamaggañāṇena
tika-abh08t24:44_12: saha vāsanāya samucchinnattā tato accantaṁ vigato. Paramarucirasirisobhaggasamāgamena
tika-abh08t24:45_0: Ettāvatā ca dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti attahitasampattito, parahitapaṭipattito
tika-abh08t24:45_2: anupādisesanibbānādhigamo ca, parahitapaṭipatti pana āsayappayogavasena duvidhaṁ
tika-abh08t24:45_3: parahitasamīhanaṁ. Tattha dhammadesanāya abhājanesu devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi
tika-abh08t24:45_4: niccaṁ hitajjhāsayatā aparipākagatindriyānaṁ indriyaparipākakālāgamanañca āsayo nāma.
tika-abh08t24:45_6: payogo nāma. Duvidhāsu panetāsu parahitapaṭipattīsu, tividhāsu ca attahitasampattīsu
tika-abh08t24:45_7: anantakaruṇā-vacanena, tathā āgataṭṭhena ca tathāgata-saddena āsayavasena parahitapaṭipatti
tika-abh08t24:45_8: dassitā, bodhanaṭṭhena buddha-saddena, tathadassanaṭṭhena ca tathāgataṭṭhena ca tathāgatasaddena
tika-abh08t24:45_10: ca buddha-saddena tividhāpi attahitasampatti, anuttaravacanena ca attahitaparahitasampatti
tika-abh08t24:46_0: Apica hetuphalasattūpakārasampadāvasena tīhākārehipi bhagavato thomanā pavattatīti
tika-abh08t24:46_1: taṁvasenapettha thomanā daṭṭhabbā. Tattha hetusampadā nāma mahākaruṇāsamāyogo, bodhisambhārasambharaṇañca
tika-abh08t24:46_2: tammūlakattā sakalabuddhaguṇānaṁ. Phalasampadā pana catubbidhā ñāṇasampadā, pahānasampadā,
tika-abh08t24:46_3: ānubhāvasampadā, rūpakāyasampadā cāti. Tāsu sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṁ maggañāṇaṁ,
tika-abh08t24:46_4: maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ, tammūlakāni ca dasabalādiñāṇāni ñāṇasampadā
tika-abh08t24:46_5: nāma. Aggamaggabhāvanāya sabbakilesānaṁ saha vāsanāhi anuppattidhammatāpādanaṁ pahānasampadā.
tika-abh08t24:46_6: Acinteyyāparimitānaṁ sabbalokahitānaṁ nipphādane, sadevakalokābhibhavane ca ādhipaccaṁ
tika-abh08t24:46_8: attabhāvasampatti rūpakāyasampadā nāma. Sattūpakāro heṭṭhā vuttaparahitapaṭipattivaseneva
tika-abh08t24:46_9: veditabbo. Imāsu pana anantakaruṇā-vacanena, tathā āgataṭṭhena ca tathāgata-saddena
tika-abh08t24:46_10: hetusampadā dassitā. Phalasampadāsu ñāṇasampadā ceva pahānasampadā ca anantapaññā-vacanena,
tika-abh08t24:46_13: ca vibhāvitā, rūpakāyasampadā pana rūpaggappattidīpakena anuttara-saddena dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:47_0: Evaṁ buddharatanassa thomanāpubbaṅgamaṁ paṇāmaṁ katvā idāni sesaratanānampi paṇāmamārabhanto
tika-abh08t24:47_1: āha ‘‘dhammaṁ sādhugaṇampi cā’’ti. Bhagavato thomanena ca svākkhātatādayo dhammaguṇā,
tika-abh08t24:47_2: suppaṭipannatādayo saṅghaguṇā ca dassitā honti tappabhavassa anaññathābhāvatoti na
tika-abh08t24:47_3: tesaṁ visuṁ thomanā katā. Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe puggale yathānusiṭṭhaṁ
tika-abh08t24:47_4: paṭipajjamāne ca apāyadukkhesu ceva vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-abh08t24:47_5: so catunnaṁ ariyamaggānaṁ, catunnañca sāmaññaphalānaṁ, nibbānassa, pariyattidhammassa
tika-abh08t24:52_0: Ettha hi kāmarāgādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati etenāti ‘‘rāgavirāgo’’ti maggo kathito.
tika-abh08t24:52_1: Ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya, antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa ca sokassa taduppattiyaṁ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā
tika-abh08t24:52_3: nibbānaṁ vuttaṁ. Avirodhadīpanato pana atthabyañjanassa sampannatāya, pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato
tika-abh08t24:52_4: suṭṭhu vibhajitattā ca ‘‘appaṭikūla’’ntiādinā sabbopi pariyattidhammo kathito. Tattha
tika-abh08t24:52_5: ariyamagganibbānāni nippariyāyeneva apāyādito dhāraṇato dhammo, phalapariyattiyo
tika-abh08t24:52_6: pana pariyāyena. Tathā hettha dhāraṇaṁ nāma apāyādinibbattakakilesaviddhaṁsanaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:52_7: Iti ariyamaggassa kilesasamucchedakatāya, nibbānassa ca ālambaṇabhāvena tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyapi
tika-abh08t24:52_8: ubhinnampi nippariyāyato labbhati. Itaresu pana ariyaphalassa maggena samucchinnakilesānaṁ
tika-abh08t24:53_0: Attahitaparahitaṁ sādhentīti sādhū, tesaṁ gaṇo samudāyoti sādhugaṇo, sādhu cāyaṁ
tika-abh08t24:53_1: gaṇo cāti vā sādhugaṇo, sādhuno vā sammāsambuddhassa āyatto gaṇo tassa orasaputtabhāvatoti
tika-abh08t24:53_2: sādhugaṇo. So pana catunnaṁ ariyamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ, catunnañca phalasamaṅgīnaṁ vasena
tika-abh08t24:53_3: aṭṭhavidho ariyasaṅgho, taṁ sādhugaṇaṁ. Picāti nipātasamudāyo, eko vā nipāto, tiṇṇaṁ
tika-abh08t24:53_4: ratanānaṁ vandanakiriyāya sampiṇḍanattho. Keci ‘‘gaṇo’’ti idha pakaraṇatova ariyagaṇapuggalova
tika-abh08t24:53_5: labbhatīti sādhūti bhāvanapuṁsakavasena ‘‘vanditvā’’ti iminā saha yojenti, tadā pana
tika-abh08t24:54_0: 2. Evaṁ pakaraṇārambhe yathādhippetaṁ ratanattayappaṇāmaṁ katvā idāni yattha pāṭavatthāya
tika-abh08t24:54_1: idaṁ pakaraṇaṁ paṭṭhapīyati, taṁ saddhiṁ desakadesapaṭiggāhakasampattīhi vibhāvetvā
tika-abh08t24:54_2: dassento āha ‘‘paṇḍukambalanāmāyā’’tiādi. Tattha devarājassa paṇḍukambalanāmāya silāya
tika-abh08t24:54_3: vimale sītale tale nisinno atulavikkamo devadevehi pūjito devadevo devapurakkhato
tika-abh08t24:54_4: devānaṁ devalokasmiṁ yaṁ dhammaṁ desesīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t24:55_0: Ayaṁ panettha attho – paṇḍukambalasarikkhavaṇṇatāya ‘‘paṇḍukambala’’nti nāmaṁ samaññā
tika-abh08t24:55_1: etissāti paṇḍukambalanāmā. Sā hi sakkassa tādisapuññānubhāvena nibbattā paṇḍukambalajayasumanapupphasamānena
tika-abh08t24:55_2: vaṇṇena sabbakālaṁ virocati , pamāṇato pana saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā, paññāsayojanavitthārā,
tika-abh08t24:55_3: pannarasayojanubbedhā ca hoti. Silāyāti avayavasambandhe sāmivacanaṁ. Tulāya sammito
tika-abh08t24:55_4: tulyo, na tulyo atulyo, atulyo vikkamo balaṁ etassāti atulyavikkamo. Sammāsambuddhassa
tika-abh08t24:55_6: dasakoṭisahassapurisānaṁ balehi samappamāṇena kāyabalena, appamāṇena ca ñāṇabalena
tika-abh08t24:55_7: na kassaci devabrahmādīsu aññatarassa balatulanāya upanetabbaṁ atthi . Atha vā anaññasādhāraṇattā
tika-abh08t24:55_9: samannāgatattā vā atulyo sammappadhānasaṅkhāto vikkamo imassāti atulyavikkamo. ‘‘Atulyavikkamo’’ti
tika-abh08t24:55_10: ca vattabbe gāthābandhavasena ya-kāralopaṁ katvā ‘‘atulavikkamo’’ti vuttaṁ. Atha
tika-abh08t24:55_11: vā sammitatthe a-kārapaccayassāpi sambhavato atulo vikkamo assāti ‘‘atulavikkamo’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:56_0: Dibbantīti devā, pañcakāmaguṇādīhi kīḷanti, tesu vā viharanti, vijayasamatthatāyogena
tika-abh08t24:56_2: taṁtaṁatthānusāsanañca karontā voharanti, puññañāṇānubhāvappattāya jutiyā jotenti,
tika-abh08t24:56_3: yathādhippetañca visayaṁ appaṭighātena gacchanti, yathicchitanipphādane ca sakkontīti
tika-abh08t24:56_4: attho. Atha vā devanīyā taṁtaṁbyasananittharaṇatthikehi ‘‘saraṇaṁ parāyaṇa’’nti gamanīyā,
tika-abh08t24:56_5: abhitthavanīyā sobhāvisesayogena kamanīyāti vā devā, te tividhā – sammutidevā upapattidevā
tika-abh08t24:56_6: visuddhidevāti. Tattha sammutidevā nāma mahāsammatādayo khattiyā. Upapattidevā nāma
tika-abh08t24:56_7: cātumahārājike upādāya taduttaridevā. Visuddhidevā nāma khīṇāsavā. Idha pana upapattidevā
tika-abh08t24:56_8: daṭṭhabbā. No ca kho tepi avisesena, ṭhapetvā pana yāmādike cātumahārājikatāvatiṁsavāsinova
tika-abh08t24:56_9: adhippetā. Tesaṁ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi rañjanato rājā, devānaṁ rājā issaro devarājā,
tika-abh08t24:56_10: tassa devarājassa, ‘‘sakkassa devarañño’’ti adhippāyo. Na hi aññesaṁ devalokesu nisinno
tika-abh08t24:57_0: 3.Yanti aniyamaniddeso, tassa pana ‘‘tatthā’’ti iminā niyamanaṁ veditabbaṁ. Yathāvuttānaṁ
tika-abh08t24:57_1: tiṇṇampi devānaṁ uttamo devo tehi sabbehi adhikataraṁ kīḷanādiyogatoti devadevo,
tika-abh08t24:57_2: bhagavā. So hi niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānasiddhāya
tika-abh08t24:57_6: appaṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgatattā sadevakena vā lokena ‘‘saraṇa’’nti gamanīyato,
tika-abh08t24:57_7: abhitthavanīyato, bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya
tika-abh08t24:57_8: ṭhitoti sabbadevehi pūjanīyataro devo , visuddhidevabhāvasaṅkhātassa vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkārassa
tika-abh08t24:57_9: adhigatattā aññesañca devānaṁ atisayena devoti devadevo. Devānanti tadā dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṁ
tika-abh08t24:57_11: gahaṇanti vadanti. Te pana upapattidevesveva saṅgahitā manussaarahantānaṁ tattha
tika-abh08t24:57_12: abhāvato . Devadevehīti visuddhidevehi. Visuddhidevā hi vuttanayena itaradevehi sātisayaṁ
tika-abh08t24:57_13: kīḷanādiyogato idha ‘‘devadevā’’ti adhippetā, tehi. Pūjitoti pūjitabbo, pūjituṁ arahoti
tika-abh08t24:57_14: attho. Etena visuddhidevesupi bhagavato aggapuggalataṁ dīpeti. Desesīti madhurakaravīkasaddasadisaṁ
tika-abh08t24:57_15: brahmassaraṁ nicchārento pakāsesi. Devalokasminti tāvatiṁsadevaloke. Sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇaṁ
tika-abh08t24:57_16: dhāretīti dhammo, kusalādibhedo abhidhammo, idha pana tappakāsakaṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ
tika-abh08t24:57_17: ‘‘dhamma’’nti vuttaṁ. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘piṭakuttame’’ti. Devapurakkhatoti dasasahassacakkavāḷavāsidibbabrahmehi
tika-abh08t24:58_0: Nanu ca ‘‘devāna’’nti vacaneneva devapurakkhatabhāvo siddhoti kiṁ ‘‘devapurakkhato’’ti
tika-abh08t24:58_1: vacanena? Nāyaṁ doso. Bhagavā hi kadāci cūḷapanthakattherādīnaṁ viya parammukhepi
tika-abh08t24:58_2: nisīditvā obhāsaṁ vissajjetvā sattānaṁ sammukhe nisinnaṁ viya dassento dhammaṁ deseti,
tika-abh08t24:58_3: kadācipi pārāyanikabrāhmaṇādīnaṁ viya sammukhepi nisīditvā aññehi ca parivuto aññesampi
tika-abh08t24:58_4: dhammaṁ deseti, idha pana na tathā, devehiyeva parivuto devānaṁ desetīti dassanatthaṁ
tika-abh08t24:59_0: 4. Evametasmiṁ pakaraṇe gāravajananatthaṁ tena sampādetabbapāṭavavisayaṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ
tika-abh08t24:59_2: ca vibhāvetuṁ ‘‘tatthāha’’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha ‘‘pāṭavatthāyā’’ti iminā pakaraṇārambhapayojanaṁ
tika-abh08t24:59_5: ‘‘Aha’’nti kattubhūtaṁ attānaṁ niddisati. Tathā hi yo paro na hoti, so niyakajjhattasaṅkhāto
tika-abh08t24:60_0: Paṭuno bhāvo pāṭavaṁ, taṁyeva attho payojanaṭṭhenāti pāṭavattho, tadatthāya. Taṁ
tika-abh08t24:60_1: sandhāya vividhanayaggahaṇasamatthassa sutamayañāṇassa uppādanatthanti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t24:60_2: Saṁsāre bhayaṁ ikkhanti, bhindanti vā pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhū, tesaṁ. Piṭakañca
tika-abh08t24:60_3: taṁ uttamañcāti piṭakuttamaṁ, tasmiṁ piṭakuttame, abhidhammapiṭaketi adhippāyo. Tañhi
tika-abh08t24:60_4: pariyattibhājanatthato piṭakaṁ, tīsu piṭakesu visiṭṭhabhāvato uttamañcāti piṭakuttamaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:60_5: Tattha pariyattibhājanatthatoti pariyattiatthena ceva bhājanatthena ca. Tathā hi
tika-abh08t24:60_7: puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭaka’’ntiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.228; a. ni. 3.70) yaṁ kiñci bhājanampi.
tika-abh08t24:60_8: Tasmā idampi pariyāpuṇitabbaṭṭhena pariyatti, abhidhammatthānamādhāraṇatthena bhājanañcāti
tika-abh08t24:64: Tayopi vinayādayo ñeyyā’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā; pārā. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā; dha. sa. aṭṭha. nidānakathā);
tika-abh08t24:65_0: Visiṭṭhabhāvo panassa lokavohāramatikkamma yathāsabhāvavasena desanato, visiṭṭhadhammakkhandhavibhāvanato
tika-abh08t24:65_1: ca veditabbo. Ettha hi ‘‘satto puggalo bhikkhū’’tiādikaṁ lokavohāramatikkamma ‘‘khandhadhātuāyatana’’ntiādinā
tika-abh08t24:65_2: yathādhammavaseneva bāhulladesanā pavattā, na itaresu viya yathāvuttavohāravasena,
tika-abh08t24:65_3: yato idaṁ yathādhammasāsananti vuccati. Sabbasaṅkhatadhammavisiṭṭho cettha paññākkhandho
tika-abh08t24:65_4: visesato vibhāvito, tasmā tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṁ buddhavacanabhāvepi yathāsabhāvānatikkamadesanādito
tika-abh08t24:65_5: idameva tīsu piṭakesu visiṭṭhanti yuttaṁ. Apica dhammātirekadhammavisesabhāvato cassa
tika-abh08t24:65_6: visiṭṭhabhāvo veditabbo. Abhidhamme hi nippadesato khandhāyatanādidhammānaṁ vibhattattā
tika-abh08t24:65_7: itaradvayato atirekatarā, visiṭṭhā ca pāḷi hoti, tasmā atirekassa, visiṭṭhassa ca
tika-abh08t24:65_8: pāḷidhammassa vasena idameva tīsu piṭakesu uttamanti vattuṁ vaṭṭati. Yathāvuttavisiṭṭhabhāvayogatoyeva
tika-abh08t24:65_10: vuḍḍhimantādidhammānaṁ ettha vuttattā cetaṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ. Yathāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh08t24:67: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā; pārā. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā; dha. sa. aṭṭha. nidānakathā);
tika-abh08t24:68_0: Tathā hettha ‘‘rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti, mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā
tika-abh08t24:68_1: viharatī’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 160 ādayo) vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā, ‘‘rūpārammaṇaṁ
tika-abh08t24:68_2: vā saddārammaṇaṁ vā’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 1) nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhitabbattā salakkhaṇāpi
tika-abh08t24:68_3: ‘‘sekkhā dhammā asekkhā dhammā, lokuttarā dhammā’’tiādinā nayena pūjitā pūjārahāpi
tika-abh08t24:68_4: ‘‘phasso hoti, vedanā hotī’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 1) nayena sabhāvaparicchinnattā paricchinnāpi
tika-abh08t24:68_5: ‘‘mahaggatā dhammā appamāṇā dhammā (dha. sa. tikamātikā 12, dukamātikā 99), anuttarā
tika-abh08t24:68_6: dhammā’’tiādinā nayena adhikā visiṭṭhāpi dhammā vuttā, tasmā abhi-saddassa vuḍḍhiādiatthesupi
tika-abh08t24:68_7: pavattanato ‘‘vuḍḍhimanto dhammā etthā’’tiādinā nibbacanena idaṁ piṭakaṁ ‘‘abhidhamma’’nti
tika-abh08t24:68_8: vuccati. Abhidhammaṁ otaranti anenāti abhidhammāvatāraṁ nāma pakaraṇaṁ. Iminā panassa
tika-abh08t24:68_9: atthānugatamabhidhānaṁ dasseti. Tu-saddo padapūraṇe. Ācariyena hi gāthāpadapūraṇatthaṁ
tika-abh08t24:68_10: yebhuyyena tattha tattha nipātā vuccanti. Yattha pana nesaṁ payojanaviseso dissati,
tika-abh08t24:68_11: tattheva tamatthaṁ vakkhāma. Madhuranti nippariyāyato madhura-saddoyaṁ jivhāviññeyye
tika-abh08t24:68_12: rasavisese vattati, idha pana iṭṭhabhāvasāmaññena atthabyañjanasampatti madhurasaddena
tika-abh08t24:68_13: vuttā. Bhavati hi taṁsadisassa taṁ-saddenābhidhānaṁ yathā ‘‘aggimāṇavo’’ti. Tena
tika-abh08t24:68_14: pana madhurena yogato idampi madhuraṁ yathā nīlaguṇayogato nīluppalanti. Nipuṇagambhīrāya
tika-abh08t24:68_15: byañjanasampattiyā ceva atthasampattiyā ca abhidhammavisayaṁ matiṁ vaḍḍhetīti mativaḍḍhanaṁ.
tika-abh08t24:69_0: 5.Tāḷanti kuñcikaṁ, kuñcikāsadisanti attho. Muyhanti tenāti moho, avijjāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ,
tika-abh08t24:69_1: mohoyeva abhidhammamahāpuraṁ pavisantānaṁ pavesananivāraṇattā kavāṭabhūtoti mohakavāṭaṁ,
tika-abh08t24:69_2: tassa. Vighāṭeti, vighāṭīyati anenāti vā vighāṭanaṁ. Nanu ca avijjākavāṭaṁ paññāya
tika-abh08t24:69_3: ugghāṭīyati. Sā hi tassā ujuvipaccanīkabhūtāti? Saccaṁ, idampi tassā kāraṇabhāvena
tika-abh08t24:69_4: ‘‘mohakavāṭavighāṭanakara’’nti vuttaṁ. Kāraṇakāraṇampi hi kāraṇavasena vuccati yathā
tika-abh08t24:70_1: mandabuddhīhi tarituṁ asakkuṇeyyattā atiduttaraṁ, teneva cedaṁ mahodadhisamānattā
tika-abh08t24:70_2: ‘‘mahodadhī’’ti vuttaṁ. Mahaṇṇavopi hi caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro na sakkā aññatra
tika-abh08t24:70_3: sinerupabbatarājato kenaci patiṭṭhaṁ laddhuṁ, evamidampi catugambhīratāpaṭisaṁyuttaṁ
tika-abh08t24:70_4: aññatra tathāgatā na kenaci patiṭṭhaṁ laddhuṁ sakkāti. Tarantānanti atthaggahaṇavasena
tika-abh08t24:70_5: uttaritukāmānaṁ. Ettha ca ‘‘taraṁvā’’ti adhikāravasena vattabbaṁ, vakkhamānaṁ vā
tika-abh08t24:70_6: ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ. Tarantānanti paratīrasampāpuṇanatthaṁ uttarantānaṁ. Taraṁvāti
tika-abh08t24:70_7: uḷumpaṁ viya, taṁsamānanti attho. Makarā nāma macchajātikā, tesaṁ ākaro nivāsabhūmīti makarākaro, taṁ.
tika-abh08t24:71_0: 7. Abhidhamme niyuttā ābhidhammikā, tesaṁ. Hatthasāraṁ viyāti hatthasāraṁ. Yathā
tika-abh08t24:71_1: hi manussānaṁ bahūsu ratanādīsu vijjamānesupi āpadāsu ca sukhaparibhogatthaṁ hatthe
tika-abh08t24:71_2: kayiramānaṁ sāraratanādikaṁ ‘‘hatthasāra’’nti vuccati, evamidampi satipi mahante
tika-abh08t24:71_3: abhidhammapiṭake tassa sabbaso vittiṇṇatāya pariharituṁ asakkuṇeyyattā tadatthasārasampiṇḍanavasena
tika-abh08t24:71_6: vattamānasamīpattā vā anāgate vattamānūpacārato vattamānavacanaṁ, paṭiññānantarameva
tika-abh08t24:71_7: vakkhatīti. Atthavasena pakārena kathentopi saddavasena saṅkhipitvā kathessāmīti
tika-abh08t24:71_8: dassento āha ‘‘samāsenā’’ti. Samasanaṁ saṁkhipanaṁ samāso, tena samāsena, na byāsavasenāti
tika-abh08t24:71_10: dassetvā idāni yasmā sotujanasamussāhanaṁ nāma tesaṁ sakkaccasavane niyuñjanaṁ, tasmā
tika-abh08t24:71_11: te tattha niyojento āha ‘‘taṁ suṇātha samāhitā’’ti. Sakkaccasavanapaṭibaddhā hi sammāpaṭipattīti.
tika-abh08t24:71_12: Tattha tanti taṁ mayā vakkhamānaṁ abhidhammāvatāraṁ suṇātha nisāmayatha. Samāhitā
